text: @ProjectLincoln @realDonaldTrump No, that was your HERO democrat governors forcing nursing homes to take recovering Covid-19 patients, thus killing off grandma and getting more Pelosi payola to do it.  Keep lying though.  It’s all you imbeciles know. #ProjectLincolnLies #DemocratsLiePeopleDie #ObamagateIsReal
